quote: He who can, does. – George Bernard Shaw
fact: When you sneeze, air and particles travel through the nostrils at speeds over100 mph.  During this time, all bodily functions stop, including your heart, contributing to the impossibility of keeping one`s eyes open during a sneeze.
joke: Why did the kid cross the playground? To get to the other slide.
